titleStmt.title: A briefe discourse, concerning the power of the Peeres and Comons of Parliament, in point of judicature written by a learned antiquerie, at the request of a peere, of this realme.
titleStmt.author: Selden, John, 1584-1654.
Cotton, Robert, Sir, 1571-1631.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Selden by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Sometimes attributed to Sir R. Cotton.--Cf. STC (2nd ed.).
Place of publication and name of publisher suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Pages 2 and 3 misnumbered as 6 and 7 respectively.
This item can be found at reel 1006:15 and at reel 1824:26.
Reproduction of originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and the Harvard University Library.
